content: पामर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (रा --री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पामन्-र] {@--1@} Diseased with scab, scabby. {@--2@} Vile, wicked. {@--3@} Low, vulgar, base. {@--4@} Foolish, stupid. {@--5@} Poor, helpless; <ls>Ud. D. 5.</ls> --रः {@--1@} A fool, an idiot; वल्गंति चेत्पामराः <ls>Bv. 1. 72.</ls> {@--2@} A wicked or low man. {@--3@} One engaged in the most degrading occupation.
